package.name: nss
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/nss/ case $(uname -m) in x86_64) make BUILD_OPT=1 \ NSPR_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/include/nspr \ USE_SYSTEM_ZLIB=1 \ ZLIB_LIBS=-lz \ NSS_USE_SYSTEM_SQLITE=1 USE_64=1 ;; *) make BUILD_OPT=1 \ NSPR_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/include/nspr \ USE_SYSTEM_ZLIB=1 \ ZLIB_LIBS=-lz \ NSS_USE_SYSTEM_SQLITE=1 ;; esac
package.install: mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/pkgconfig mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/include/nss cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/dist/ install -v -m755 Linux*/lib/*.so ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib install -v -m644 Linux*/lib/{*.chk,libcrmf.a} ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib cp -v -RL {public,private}/nss/* ${TGTDIR}/usr/include/nss chmod -v 644 ${TGTDIR}/usr/include/nss/* install -v -m755 Linux*/bin/{certutil,nss-config,pk12util} ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin install -v -m644 Linux*/lib/pkgconfig/nss.pc ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/pkgconfig
